content: उद्गम् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To rise or go up, ascend (as a star &c.); असह्यवातोद्गतरेणुमंडला <ls>Rs. 1. 10.</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab> {@--2@} To shoot up, dart upwards, appear; अचिरोद्गतपल्लवं <ls>V. 4. 23</ls>; <ls>Rs. 6. 18</ls>; so उद्गतशृंगो वत्सः. {@--3@} To rise or spring from, proceed, originate, arise; इत्युद्गताः पौरवधूमुखेभ्यः शृण्वन् कथाः <ls>R. 7. 16</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 91.</ls> {@--4@} To go out, break out, depart (as life &c.). {@--5@} To be famous or wellknown, spread; उन्नाभ इत्युद्गतनामधेयः <ls>R. 18. 20.</ls>
